snippet: Representatives to the U.N. civil aviation body are considering whether the agency should expand its role and issue safety advisories after a Malaysian airliner was shot down last week, two sources said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Members of U.N. Aviation Body Are Mulling Bigger Role: Sources
headline.main: Members of U.N. Aviation Body Are Mulling Bigger Role: Sources

lead_paragraph: Representatives to the U.N. civil aviation body are considering whether the agency should expand its role and issue safety advisories after a Malaysian airliner was shot down last week, two sources said on Tuesday.
